title: Slow Performance
description: Is your computer running slow? Try cleaning up your hard drive, uninstalling unnecessary programs, and running a virus scan to improve performance. Regular maintenance can keep your system running smoothly.
steps: Clean up temporary files using Disk Cleanup.
Uninstall unnecessary programs.
Run a full virus scan.
Check for and install any available updates.

title: Internet Connectivity Issues
description: Having trouble with your internet connection? Restart your router, check your network settings, and ensure your drivers are up to date. Switching to a wired connection can also improve stability.
steps: Restart your router and modem.
Verify your network settings.
Update your network drivers.
Try using a wired connection instead of Wi-Fi.

title: Software Crashes
description: Is your software crashing frequently? Ensure that your software is updated to the latest version, check for system compatibility, and reinstall if necessary.
steps: Update the software to the latest version.
Check system requirements and compatibility.
Reinstall the software.
Run the program in compatibility mode.

title: Overheating
description: Is your PC overheating? Clean out dust from your PC, ensure proper ventilation, and consider adding more cooling solutions.
steps: Clean out dust from the interior and fans.
Ensure the PC is in a well-ventilated area.
Add additional cooling solutions like fans or liquid cooling.

title: Blue Screen of Death (BSOD)
description: Encountering a Blue Screen of Death? Note the error code, update your drivers, and check for hardware issues.
steps: Note the BSOD error code.
Update all drivers.
Run a memory check using Windows Memory Diagnostic.
Check for hardware issues like faulty RAM or hard drive.

title: Slow Game Performance
description: Is your game running slow on your console? Clear your cache, close background applications, and ensure your console is updated.
steps: Clear the console's cache.
Close any background applications.
Check for and install system updates.

title: Network Connectivity Issues
description: Having network issues on your console? Restart your router, check your network settings, and use a wired connection for better stability.
steps: Restart your router and modem.
Check your console's network settings.
Use a wired Ethernet connection.

title: Disc Reading Errors
description: Is your console having trouble reading discs? Clean the disc, ensure it's not scratched, and try another disc to rule out console issues.
steps: Clean the disc with a soft cloth.
Check for scratches or damage.
Try a different disc to see if the problem persists.

title: Controller Issues
description: Controller not responding? Reset the controller, update its firmware, and check the batteries or charging cable.
steps: Reset the controller by pressing the reset button.
Update the controller's firmware.
Check and replace the batteries or charging cable.

title: Overheating
description: Is your console overheating? Ensure it's in a well-ventilated area, clean the vents, and avoid placing it on soft surfaces.
steps: Place the console in a well-ventilated area.
Clean the vents to remove dust.
Avoid placing the console on soft surfaces like carpets or beds.

title: Snap Windows Using Keyboard
description: Quickly organize open windows by snapping them to screen edges using keyboard shortcuts.
steps: Press Win + Right Arrow, then Win + Up Arrow to snap the window to the top-right corner.

title: Enhance Touch Compatibility
description: Activate the touch-friendly interface on touch-enabled devices for easier navigation.
steps: Go to Start > Settings > System > Tablet Mode to enable touch-friendly features.

title: Secure Wi-Fi Settings
description: Improve your Wi-Fi security by managing Wi-Fi Sense settings.
steps: Navigate to Start > Settings > Network & Internet > Wi-Fi > Manage Wi-Fi settings to disable Wi-Fi Sense.

title: Adjust Privacy Settings
description: Control app permissions and hardware access to enhance privacy.
steps: Access Start > Settings > Privacy to customize privacy settings for apps and hardware.

title: Optimize Battery Usage
description: Extend battery life by adjusting the Battery Saver settings on your PC.
steps: Activate Battery Saver from the battery icon on the taskbar to conserve energy.

title: Perform Regular Malware Scans
description: Keep your PC safe from malware by performing regular scans.
steps: Use Windows Security to run virus scans and check for security updates regularly.

title: Shake to Minimize
description: Quickly minimize all open windows except the active one using a simple mouse gesture.
steps: Click and hold the title bar of the window you want to keep open and shake it.

title: Quick Access to Settings
description: Access the Settings app quickly using a simple keyboard shortcut.
steps: Press Windows Key + I to open the Settings app directly.

title: Efficient Screen Capture
description: Capture your screen efficiently using built-in shortcuts.
steps: Press Windows Key + PrtScn to take a screenshot and save it automatically.

title: Manage Display Settings Quickly
description: Easily manage your display settings for multiple monitors.
steps: Use Windows Key + P to switch between display modes like extend and duplicate.

title: Customize the Start Menu
description: Personalize the Start menu to better suit your preferences.
steps: Open Settings, go to Personalization > Start, and adjust visibility settings for apps and folders.

title: Access Expanded Right-Click Menu
description: Access more options in the right-click context menu.
steps: Press Shift + F10 to open the old-style context menu in Windows Explorer.

title: Use Virtual Desktops
description: Enhance productivity by organizing apps and windows across multiple virtual desktops.
steps: Press Win + Tab to open the Task View pane and manage virtual desktops.

title: Adjust Taskbar Alignment
description: Customize the alignment and appearance of your taskbar in Windows.
steps: Go to Settings > Personalization > Taskbar to adjust the taskbar alignment and settings.

title: Check Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Learn and utilize keyboard shortcuts to enhance your productivity.
steps: Familiarize yourself with essential Windows keyboard shortcuts for efficient navigation.

title: Monitor SSD Health
description: Keep an eye on the health of your SSD to avoid data loss.
steps: Use tools to check the health and remaining lifespan of your SSD regularly.

title: Track Internet Activity
description: Monitor your internet activity to maintain security and manage bandwidth.
steps: Use Windows Firewall logs to track and monitor incoming and outgoing traffic.

title: Enable Administrator Account
description: Enable the hidden administrator account for full control over the system.
steps: Activate the built-in administrator account through User Accounts in the Control Panel for advanced management.

title: Optimize Taskbar Space
description: Maximize taskbar space by customizing its features.
steps: Right-click the taskbar, select Cortana, and adjust visibility settings to reclaim space.

title: Simultaneously Resize Snapped Windows
description: Efficiently manage your workspace by resizing snapped windows together.
steps: Drag the dividing border between two snapped windows to resize them simultaneously.
